summary: Three children living in a displacement camp in northern Uganda compete in their country's national music and dance festival.
cast: Dominic|Nancy|Rose|Jane Adong|Kitara Coldwell|Joshua Kyallo|Members of Acholi Tribe|Janani Okot|Jolly Okot|Stephen Rwangyezi
director: Directors: Sean Fine, Andrea Nix (as Andrea Nix Fine)
title: War Dance
